resources: WellGo Latest and Service Agreement//User Agreement Privacy Policy//Privacy Policy By pressing the "Confirm" Button, you agree to the updated terms and conditions outlined in the Service Agreement and Privacy Policy. WellGo permissions instructions To ensure the normal use of the APP, please enable the following permissions Use the Bluetooth function Need to use the phone\'s Bluetooth function to connect to the Bluetooth watch Use Location Map running track record and search Bluetooth watch need to turn on the phone GPS switch Location permission usage WellGo collect location data to support athletic fitness tracking, even when the app is closed or not in use. Camera permission use Use the camera to take a picture as an avatar File read and write permission usage The camera takes a picture and saves, select a picture from the album as the avatar Use of phone permissions Message reminder function, incoming call reminds the watch to check the current incoming call status Use of permissions for contacts and address book When a call comes in, the watch can display the name and phone number Location permission instructions To view the track record of the sports map, please allow WellGo to use your location WellGo will collect location information data to support the track record function. With location enabled, you will get a more accurate location history. Disallowed location information may not obtain accurate movement track records! Body Weight: Weighting Date: BEST DAY MAX GOAL BEST WEEK BEST MONTH Setting Log Out BMI: Name Gender Birth Height Body Weight BMI Step Target Save Next Female Male over-light normal slightly fat obese over-obese BMI(Body Mass Index) is an international standard to measure body is fat or not, which is also a reference value about health. it takes height and weight into consideration. BMI is an easy-to-use way to response body condition, the over-obese adult has a higher risk in disease such as cardinally and hypertension. About BMI SETTING According to advise from WHO, the adult needs a normal sport about 40 mins, which burns calories as same as walking for 8000 fast-steps. With regard to accuracy, The accuracy of devices is not intended to match medical devices or scientific measurement devices. Not Receiving Verification?Click Here for Help Issue with log-in or sign-in Click here to get troubleshooting How Accurate Are the Results? The auto-detection sleep trackers are considered generally accurate, they are also prone to errors because of different user habits. Please check the sleep quality later if it\'s no data when you just finished sleep within 30 mins, the data is being analysed. APP into the upgrade again Equipment capacity is less than 50%, are not allowed to upgrade! Affected by system upgrades, user active denial of permissions, Android future version and other factors, the unique identity code of the native visitor may be changed, users who use the "tourist login" will likely be data loss situation, it is recommended to register users via email. In order to realize the third-party account login and log collection function, we use mobtech\'s mobsdk product. For the privacy policy terms of this product, please refer to:http://www.mob.com/about/policy You should accept our Terms of Service
